posts.post_content:
Anybody want to trade T205s?  I have a handful, mostly with Sovereign backs, that I will trade to upgrade my Sovereign collection, or for Sovereigns from T206.  I'm also looking for 1963-64 Parkie hockey, as well as 1980-81 OPC hockey.

Cheers,
Geno
